name: Beaver Rafter
description:
Imagine this; it's a quiet day, you're calmly drifting down the river on your raft, just minding your own business, when out of nowhere; BEAVERS!

Use the items you find in the river to defend you from the savage animals, use twigs to repair leaks in the raft, and keep up your stamina by eating apples and drinking cans.

  • Move: Arrow keys or WASD (scankeys)
  • Pick item: Q and E or the mouse wheel
  • Use item: SPACE
    • Eat apples and cans to regain stamina
    • Use twigs to repair leaky raft
    Hold mouse button to prepare shot
  • Move mouse to aim
  • Release mouse button to perform shot

NOTE: Due to lack of time doing the jam, this version of the game doesn't have an actual ending. It can be considered beaten once you get to where the grass ends.
